A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible story! Without a doubt worst Star Wars movie (so far). Poor writing\, poor directing\, and plot holes aplenty.  It's as if Disney doesen't want to make money. If your not a fan of Star Wars or continuity and plot holes dont concern you\, then perhaps you can find some enjoyment out of this film. As for me\, the amazing visuals\, CGI\, and score is the only reason worth watching.
